faq1.question: How does custom software development differ from off-the-shelf software?
faq1.answer: Custom software development is designed to meet the needs of a particular user or business, while off-the-shelf software is developed for a broader audience. One of the main advantages of custom solutions is that they are flexible and can fit in with a company's other systems and software, while off-the-shelf solutions are less flexible and not designed with the business in mind.

faq2.question: What are the benefits of developing custom software?
faq2.answer: There are many benefits to developing custom software, including personalization, efficiency, and scalability. Custom software developers design and build the systems with your infrastructure and current systems in mind, which means they will integrate seamlessly with your other software. Ultimately, this leads to greater productivity and reliability.

forcepoint-page.page_heading: Smart video solutions that safeguard your organization.
forcepoint-page.subtitle1: To Enable Nuclear Engineers to Monitor Systems from Anywhere
forcepoint-page.paragraph1: Rolls Royce is a pioneer in engineering cutting-edge technologies that deliver clean, safe, and competitive solutions for the global power industry. The nuclear division provides power companies with a competitive edge through data-analytics, engineering, and support services.
forcepoint-page.paragraph2: In 2016, Rolls Royce presented its Safety Data Sheet (SDS) website at the Nuclear Information Technology Strategic Leadership (NITSL) conference.
forcepoint-page.paragraph3: To remain on the cutting-edge, Rolls Royce needed to deliver these same data, alerts, and alarms to those outside the control room, safely and in real-time. After assessing their challenge, the solution was clear to BairesDev. They needed a mobile app.
forcepoint-page.subtitle2: To Enable Nuclear Engineers to Monitor Systems from Anywhere
forcepoint-page.paragraph4: Rolls Royce is a pioneer in engineering cutting-edge technologies that deliver clean, safe, and competitive solutions for the global power industry. The nuclear division provides power companies with a competitive edge through data-analytics, engineering, and support services.
